prod_short_desc: Soar into battle with Ultimate Lance and his jet wings!
prod_long_desc:
Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets are futuristic action minifigures with epic battle gear. Take hold of the jousting lance and attach the jet boosters to Ultimate Lance's wings to play out flying battle scenes. This set features 3 scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game, and includes an Ultimate Lance minifigure.
Includes an Ultimate Lance minifigure.
Ultimate Lance merges live-action play with 3 scannable shields to obtain unique NEXO Powers for digital gaming.
Attach the jet boosters to the wings and position them for the best flying direction.
Weapons include a jousting lance and water cannon stud shooter.
Accessory elements include 2 jet boosters and a showcase stand.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 7-14.
Stands over 2” tall.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' or guardians' permission before going online.
Scan shields for each of the 3 NEXO Powers (Take off, Charge Attack and Sea Dragon) and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Collect and combine all the Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to boost your collection of ultimate battle gear.
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ episodes on Cartoon Network.
